thread.title: Formula E's concept for new 2018/19 cars unveiled
thread.title_full: Formula E's concept for new 2018/19 cars unveiled

title: Formula E's concept for new 2018/19 cars unveiled
text:
Formula E's concept for new 2018/19 cars unveiled By Sam Smith Nigel Roebuck The man Formula 1 will miss most in 2017 Share this article on 
Spark Racing Technologies has released the first concept images of the next generation of Formula E machinery, set to deliver single-car races from the 2018/19 season...
